name: Ruin Delver
description:
== Ruin Delver ==

This game was made in the Unity2D game engine as an assignment for my "Game Tools" module. We were tasked with creating a short, 2D, single level game displaying our understanding of level design. 

This game has been in development for roughly 3 weeks now, and was my first time experimenting with lighting in a 2D Unity game. I would love to improve on this game in the future, and hopefully create a full experience.

My game was inspired by other games, such as Pitfall on the Atari 2600, and visually inspired by the SNES games of the past, such as Dragon Quest 5 and 6.

Assets used:

Music by: i AM esper
